title: Check Neynar Score Rebranch Plan
overview: Refresh Check Neynar Score with a friendly, social-first visual identity that keeps the recognizable name while elevating tone, palette, typography, and key UI surfaces.
plan:
# Check Neynar Score Rebranch Plan

## Direction Snapshot
- Brand vibe: warm, social, optimistic; framing the app as a friendly companion for keeping Neynar vibes in check.
- Keep the name “Check Neynar Score” but refresh visuals with a sunrise gradient (apricot → orchid), soft neutrals, rounded glass cards, and a conversational tone.

## Implementation Steps
1. Brand Foundation
   - Update `src/lib/constants.ts` with refreshed description, CTA copy, and share messaging snippets while retaining the app name.
   - Refresh informational copy in `src/components/ui/tabs/WhatIsNeynarScoreTab.tsx` and other user-facing strings to match the friendlier voice.
2. Design Tokens & Typography
   - Replace the `primary` palette in `tailwind.config.ts` with the new sunrise gradient colors and add a complementary `accent` ramp for badges.
   - Introduce `Plus Jakarta Sans` (or similar friendly sans) via `@next/font` in `src/app/layout.tsx`, wiring the className onto `<body>`.
3. Global Look & Feel
   - Apply the new background gradient and spacing shell in `src/components/App.tsx` (outer wrapper) so the mini app reads as a colorful card over a soft backdrop.
   - Adjust `src/components/ui/Header.tsx` and `Footer.tsx` to use the updated palette, iconography, and glass card treatments.
4. Core Surfaces Refresh
   - Restyle `src/components/ui/tabs/HomeTab.tsx` and `ScoreCard.tsx` with the gradient hero, playful highlight chips, and refreshed buttons.
   - Ensure supporting components (`AddAppPrompt`, `ShareButton`, wallet surfaces if exposed) inherit the new token usage without regressions.
5. QA & Polish
   - Run targeted linting (`npm run lint`) and smoke-test score fetching plus share flows to confirm the visual refresh doesn’t break behaviour.

## Todos
- branding-copy: Rewrite constants and tab copy for the refreshed voice.
- tokens-typography: Update Tailwind palette and register the new font.
- shell-refresh: Restyle the app shell, header, and footer with the gradient/glass motif.
- tab-scorecard-refresh: Redesign the home tab, score card, and CTA components to match the new brand.
- qa-lint: Lint and smoke-test score lookup and sharing.
